      • getFileLastModified

        public static String getFileLastModified(File file,
                                         String format)
        参数:
        file -
        format - the date format like "yyyy-MM-dd"
        返回:
        the last modified date of the file

      • getFileNumberInFolder

        public static int getFileNumberInFolder(File folder)
        参数:
        folder -
        返回:
        the files' number in folder

      • getFolderNumberInFolder

        public static int getFolderNumberInFolder(File folder)
        参数:
        folder -
        返回:
        the folder's number in folder

      • getFileLastModified

        public static String getFileLastModified(File file)
        参数:
        file -
        返回:
        the last modified date of the file with the default format : yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss

      • getFileName

        public static String getFileName(File file)
        参数:
        file -
        返回:
        file name without type
        for example:
        the file name is "example.txt" then the return sub string is "example"

      • getFileType

        public static String getFileType(File file)
        参数:
        file -
        返回:
        the file type like "exe"

        返回:

      • getFolderSize

        public static String getFolderSize(File folder)
        参数:
        folder -
        返回:
        the size of files in the folder, don't include the size of sub-folders

      • getFileStatus

        public static String getFileStatus(File file)
        参数:
        file -
        返回:
        files Status: H-hidden;R-Read;W-Write

      • getFileInfo

        public static String getFileInfo(File file)
        参数:
        file -
        返回:
        file's info: full path, lastModified, status, file or folder, size

                                    int bufferSize)
                             throws FileNotFoundException,
                                    IOException
        get the content of the file
        参数:
        file - target file
        bufferSize - the buffer size
        返回:
        String the file content
        抛出:
        FileNotFoundException - , IOException
        IOException

      • getFileContent

        public static String getFileContent(File file)
                             throws FileNotFoundException,
                                    IOException
        get the content of the file with defalut buffer size 1024
        参数:
        file - target file
        返回:
        String the file content
        抛出:
        FileNotFoundException - , IOException
        IOException

      • doPaste

        public static void doPaste(File source_file,
                           File target_folder)
                    throws FileNotFoundException,
                           IOException
        paste a file to the target folder with the default buffer size 4096
        参数:
        source_file - the source file
        target_folder - the target folder
        抛出:
        FileNotFoundException
        IOException

      • doPaste

        public static void doPaste(File source_file,
                           File target_folder,
                           int bufferSize)
                    throws FileNotFoundException,
                           IOException
        paste a file to the target folder
        参数:
        source_file - the source file
        target_folder - the target folder
        bufferSize - the buffer size
        抛出:
        FileNotFoundException
        IOException
